mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_signature_tb (user_id, signature_name, signature_type, signature_data, is_default, company_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{signatureName}, #{signatureType}, #{signatureData}, COALESCE(#{isDefault}, 0), #{companyId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_signature_tb SET signature_name = #{signatureName}, signature_type = #{signatureType}, signature_data = #{signatureData}, is_default = #{isDefault}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE signature_id = #{signatureId} AND company_id = #{companyId}
